member.name: T:GTranslate.Language
member.summary: Represents the default implementation of used in GTranslate.
member.remarks: Due to the way GTranslate handles the supported languages, custom translators should use a custom language class instead of this.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class, using a valid language name or code.
member.param: The language name or code. It can be a ISO 639-1 code, a ISO 639-3 code, a language name or a language alias.
member.remarks: It is recommended to use or instead.

member.name: M:GTranslate.Translators.AggregateTranslator.TranslateAsync(System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Translates a text using the available translation services.
member.returns: A task containing the translation result.
member.remarks: This method will attempt to use all the translation services passed in the constructor, in the order they were provided.

Thrown when or are null.
Thrown when no translator supports or .
Thrown when all translators fail to provide a valid result.

members.member:
Converts text into synthesized speech.
The text to convert. The voice language. Only the languages in are supported. /// The rate (speed) of synthesized speech. Google uses 1 for normal speed and 0.3 for slow speed. A task that represents the asynchronous synthesis operation. The task contains the synthesized speech in a MP3 . Thrown when this translator has been disposed. Thrown when or are null. Thrown when a could not be obtained from . Thrown when is not supported, or an error occurred during the operation.

member.summary: Returns whether Google Translate supports the specified language.

member.name: P:GTranslate.Translators.MicrosoftTranslator.DefaultVoices
member.summary: Gets a read-only dictionary containing the hardcoded TTS voices used internally in Bing Translator.
member.remarks:
This dictionary is incomplete; it only includes 1 voice per language despite the API offering multiple voices.
To get the complete list, use .

member.name: M:GTranslate.Translators.MicrosoftTranslator.GetOrUpdateMicrosoftAuthTokenAsync
member.summary: Gets or updates the Microsoft Azure Authentication Token.
member.remarks:
This token can be used in the following services:
- Bing Speech
- Microsoft Translator
- Speech Services
member.returns: A task that represents the asynchronous operation. The task contains the token.
member.exception: Thrown when the token could not be obtained from the response.
